newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunisian ICF doubles profits in 1996.
newsitem.headline: Tunisian ICF doubles profits in 1996.

text.p: Tunisia's chemical firm Industries Chimiques du Fluor net profits in 1996 amounted to 5.797 million dinars, more than the double its 2.787 million dinars in 1995, provisional results showed on Monday.
ICF, which has a capital and reserves totalling 20.052 million dinars, is listed at the Tunis Stock Exchange. Its share was last priced at 49.04 dinars.
